name: Viam Invenire
description:
The game Viam Invenire is a game about exploration, adventure, and survival. Find your way out of the state park you are lost in. Use the tools at your disposal to find your way to the extraction point. Once you have located the extraction point, signal to the searching helicopter to find yourself rescued and home safe!

This is a student made game that will likely receive only a few more updates. Be aware the sound mixing/balancing for the game is not tuned very well. Start with volume low and adjust up to desired.

Currently only available on windows in 64 bit, sorry for the inconvenience!
